Home | Residential Proxies

Real-time data for 360-degree social media visibility

Gather fresh and real-time data from any social media platform, uncover the most relevant influencers, detect shifts in consumer behavior, and gain insights into who customers are following, who's following them, what they like, and the topics they discuss.

View Pricing Start $1.99 Trial
  • 3 day trial
  • No set-up costs
  • Cancel anytime

Access any social media network

  • Facebook

    Popular social network with over 2B users globally but strict data access limits. Scrape public posts, comments, and groups for analytics. Manage multiple accounts and ad campaigns globally.

  • Instagram

    Leading image and video sharing platform with engagement and demographic data locked behind API limits. Gather influencer metrics and scrape segmentation insights.

  • Telegram

    Secure messaging app where public groups/channels contain a wealth of data. Extract channel posts, and user analytics for insights.

  • LinkedIn

    Professional network with data on companies, jobs, and skills. Aggregate profiles and resumes for recruiting. Access globally restricted company pages.

  • X

    Valuable public data but strict API limits. Facilitate large-scale tweet scraping for analytics. Overcome geographic blocks and manage multiple accounts.

  • WeChat

    Dominant app in China restricted overseas. Unlock full app functionality abroad. Scrape public account posts for consumer behavior insights.

  • Reddit

    Forum website with highly engaged niche communities. Analyze trends, topics, and sharing patterns across subreddits.

  • YouTube

    Leading video platform with data locked in a walled garden. Extract engagement metrics, comments, and other analytics.

  • TikTok

    Video app with geographic data bias. Reveal localized trending creators and scrape engagement metrics for comparison.

  • Snapchat

    Closed ecosystem with demographics and usage data largely invisible publicly. Extract insights around user behavior.

Start $1.99 Trial

Social media insights without interruptions

  • Low risk of bans

    • Constant IP rotation to avoid detection across accounts.
    • Avoiding CAPTCHAs to maintain full account access.
    • Mitigate account suspension triggers with static and long rotation time IPs.

  • Global coverage

    • 195 locations in the IP network to bypass regional blocks to any site.
    • Extract data through precise location, device, and language targeting to get niche social media data.
    • Scale campaigns and distribute traffic globally.
    • Granular geo-targeting with IP selection at the city and ISP levels across the globe.

  • Developer-friendly APIs

    • Integration with Scrapy, Selenium, and Python for effortless proxy management.
    • Connect our proxies to platforms like Jarvee and Nimble to automate account management.
    • Seamlessly work with HTTP, SOCKS5, and UDP protocols and enjoy uninterrupted connection.

  • Dedicated CSM for your social media strategy

    • Manage your expanding proxy infrastructure is simplified through a single, user-friendly dashboard.
    • Get tailored proxies for specific tasks or a flexible mix to match your needs perfectly.
    • Proactive monitoring ensures that our proxies remain stable and reliable at all times.

Accurate social media data anytime, anywhere

  • High uptime

    We understand that downtime can be costly, especially for businesses relying on social media platform data collection for critical operations. That's why is committed to providing a 99.95% uptime guarantee to minimize interruptions and ensure that your data collection efforts remain consistent.

  • Steady connections

    For social media platforms, maintaining stable data connections is essential. Boasts an impressive 98.26% average success rate in accessing social platforms to collect complete datasets.

  • Quick response time

    When scraping real-time social media data, speed is of the essence. Experience average response times of sub-200ms latency to social media sites thanks to optimized routing and distributed proxy network.

  • Concurrent sessions

    Social media platform scraping involves constantly scaling up requests to match your growing data needs. Architecture supports up to 20,000 sessions of scraping requests in parallel from a single proxy.

  • On-demand scale

    Take your social media scraping beyond what platforms permit by leveraging optimized proxies from a 191 million pool of IPs distributed globally and tailored to your use case's unique requirements.

Our residential proxy users come from different backgrounds and create both small- and large-scale projects, utilizing millions of real IPs. Whatever your project may be, we would be pleased to have you as our client.
